mapper.select: select lecNo, lecTitle, lecWriter, lecLikeCount, lecReadCount, lecPostDate from lectureBoard order by lecNo desc
mapper.insert: insert into readCount(readWho, boardNo, bType) values(#{user}, #{boardNo}, 1);
mapper.select: select ifnull(a.diff, -1) as datediff from (select datediff(now(), (select readWhen from readCount where bType = 1 and readWho=#{user} and readNo=#{readNo} order by readNo desc limit 1)) as diff) a
mapper.update: update lectureBoard set lecReadCount = lecReadCount + 1 where lecNo = #{lecNo} and bType = 1;
mapper.insert: insert into lectureBoard(bType, lecTitle, lecReview, lecWriter, lecScore, lecLink) values(1, #{lecTitle}, #{lecReview}, #{lecWriter}, #{lecScore}, #{lecLink})
